titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the James Duane Doty papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.originalsloc: Originals of letterbooks in: Huntington Library, San Marino, California.

archdesc.bioghist: Judge of the Court of the Additional Judge for the Territory of Michigan, a jurisdiction that included much of Michigan's Upper Peninsula and present-day Wisconsin.
archdesc.scopecontent: Letterbooks, 1829-1838; and notes of trials and decisions, 1823-1841.
